conversation.content: Hello! Do you know anything about the Mona Lisa?
Yes, it is a famous painting.
Leonardo da Vinci painted it. Do you know when he painted it?
He painted it between 1503 and 1506. It is very famous for the subject's smile. It is in the Louvre Museum in Paris.
Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
